title: Australians on coronavirus ship to be brought home on $15,000-a-head charter flight
description: The operator of a coronavirus-infected cruise ship stuck off Uruguay asks the Australian Government to help foot the $15,000 per passenger bill to bring Australians home.
content:
Posted 
April 08, 2020 11:48:00
Australians who have been stranded on a coronavirus-infected cruise ship off Uruguay will be flown home on a specially fitted-out charter flight in the coming days.
Key points:
